title: China Market News
text: Blue chip BIDU-SW (09888.HK)  +3.250 (+3.268%)    Short selling $113.46M; Ratio 12.994%    will provide AI functionality for Apple (AAPL.US)      's iPhone 16 and other devices released this year in China, and the two sides are in preliminary talks, Wall Street Journal reported. BIDU-SW, after re-crossing the 20MA yesterday against the market, rose above the 10/ 50MAs ($102.1) along with the ADR this morning, peaking at $105.3. It last reported at $104.7, up 4%, being the best performer among the HSTECH constituents, on volume of 3.28 million shares, involving $343 million. Its ADR Baidu (BIDU.US)       leaped 3.4% to close at US$105.66 last night.(HK stocks quote is delayed for at least 15 mins.Short Selling Data as at 2024-03-28 16:25.) (Real-time Streaming US Stocks Quote; Except All OTC quotes are at least 15 minutes delayed.)AAStocks Financial News
